data.title: Dari Nowkhah to Speak at Next Little Rock Touchdown Club Meeting
data.meta_description: Dari Nowkhah will be joining the Little Rock Touchdown Club this Monday, Nov. 21, for the weekly meeting. Nowkhah is a host and anchor on SEC Network, regularly appearing on SEC Now throughout the week, including Saturday evenings during the college football season.
data.text:
Dari Nowkhah will be joining the Little Rock Touchdown Club this Monday, Nov. 21, for the weekly meeting.

Nowkhah is a host and anchor on SEC Network, regularly appearing on SEC Now throughout the week, including Saturday evenings during the college football season. Additionally, he calls play-by-play for men’s basketball and baseball and serves as co-host of ESPN Radio’s weekly Dari and Mel Show (Saturdays) with Mel Kiper, Jr.

Nowkhah joined ESPN in June 2004 as an ESPNEWS anchor, and in August 2011 was named the host of ESPNU. He also served as a SportsCenter anchor and host of shows including Baseball Tonight and College Football Live.

Tickets to see Nowkhah speak at the Little Rock Touchdown Club are priced at $25 for members and $35 for non-members. Doors will open at 11 a.m. and the program will begin at 11:40 a.m. at the Doubletree Hotel in Downtown Little Rock. Tickets can be purchased online.

Reservations must be made by Friday, Nov. 18, 2022 by 11 a.m. After this date, ticket prices online and at the door increase to $30 for members and $40 for non-members.

To view the Little Rock Touchdown Club’s complete schedule of speakers, read this earlier article.
